mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS schedule_id, flight_time, s.airplane_id, seat.name AS seat_name, seat.grade AS seat_grade FROM schedule_tb AS s JOIN route_tb AS r ON s.route_id = r.id JOIN seat_tb AS seat ON seat.airplane_id = s.airplane_id JOIN seat_grade_tb AS sg ON sg.name = seat.grade WHERE seat.name = #{seatName} AND s.id = #{scheduleId};
